'''''Minecraft'' x ''PEZ''''' is a collaboration between ''[[Minecraft (franchise)|Minecraft]]'' and the candy brand {{Wikipedia|PEZ}}, known for its themed mechanical dispensers.<ref>{{Citation|url=https://www.trendhunter.com/trends/pez-minecraft-collection|title=Cubic Video Game Candies|author=Michael Hemsworth|website=TREND HUNTER|date=August 9, 2024}}</ref><ref>{{Citation|url=https://www.trendhunter.com/trends/pez-products|title=Collectible Cartoon Candy Products|author=Michael Hemsworth|website=TREND HUNTER|date=February 21, 2025}}</ref>
